creator: Spicer App
descriptionHtml:
Spicer allows couples to discover new sex ideas. Spicer is the sex app for couples. Join thousands other couples and discover something new in sex!

How does it work?


★ Both partners install Spicer and link with each other.
★ Both partners answer same questions with "Yes", "Maybe", "No".
★ If both partners answer "Yes" or "Maybe" to the question we display it as Match.

Matches is the list of sex ideas you want to try together. Everything answered "No" by any partner will be hidden.


What kind of questions are available?


We have questions about everything you could imagine. New ideas for your sex life are guaranteed.

Question packs are available in multiple languages: English, German, Russian, French, Portuguese.


Can I add my own questions?


Yes, you can add any number of questions.


Mood


Set your mood and choose specific matches for tonight. Mood is reset every day.


What are Hints?


You can add hints for your Matches for other couples to see them. If you are an expert in something, share your knowledge regarding safety or pleasure.


What are Challenges?


Challenge is randomly selected Match that can be accepted by you and your partner for today. You will have 24 hours to complete it.


Is it anonymous?


Yes, you are not required to provide any personal information to use Spicer. However you have an option to create an account to preserve your answers when you re-install the App.


Chat


With Spicer you can privately chat with your partner to discuss current Matches and send photos.


What are Dares?


Send dares to your partner and compete together. Choose from the list of existing dares or write your own. Sex dares are the new fun way to play with your partner.


Sex tracker calendar


Track your sexual activity with calendar. Add sexual events and view statistics.


Does it work with other phone brands?


Yes, your partner can have another phone brand and you can both use Spicer.


Is it free?


Yes, Spicer and most of the questions are Free. However if you like the App, you can purchase more advanced Question Packs to get more ideas.


What is Spicer Plus?


Spicer Plus gives you more packs and features.

★ unlimited access to all advanced packs.
★ new Plus packs!
★ vote for packs you like.
★ select any match as next challenge.
★ set challenge timer as you like or stop it.


What are Plus Packs?


Plus packs are unmoderated, please vote for good packs! Spicer can not guarantee quality of Plus packs, we hope that eventually the best ones will be up voted by users and stay on top.


What is OpenCouple


OpenCouple is the new upcoming app that allows Spicer couples to connect to each other and play together! Join now to receive special benefits on the launch date!


Spicer allows you to select desired Question Packs and answer all questions without the limits.

Missing Undercovers? Try Spicer!

Spicer was previously known as Let's Try It.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for using Spicer! This release improves chat reliability. Enjoying Spicer? Leave us nice rating and review! It really helps!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for using Spicer! This release is based on your requests. Now you can organize matches by adding and searching tags. Tap and hold to select multiple matches at once. Dares can be marked as completed even when expired. Plus lots of small fixes and improvements. Enjoying Spicer? Leave us nice rating and review! It really helps!
